name: CEEK VR
intro: A fan platform for digital content creators
introduce: CEEK connects music artists, athletes, and other digital content creators directly to their fans in virtual worlds. CEEK tokens enable real time artist payments verified on the blockchain, ensuring fast, efficient and seamless monetization for music artists and content creators.CEEK enables content creators to monetize their work using CEEK’s patent award winning virtual events streaming platform to reach audiences all over the world. CEEK unlocks new revenue streams for music artists and creators, offering a brand-new way to directly reach and monetize their fanbase.
